origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GoldFuturesAPI.analyze_price_trends', 'description': 'This function analyzes the price trends of gold futures over a specified time period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'time_period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for which to analyze the price trends, e.g., 1 year, 6 months.'}, {'name': 'analysis_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of analysis to perform, e.g., historical, real-time.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'price_trends', 'description': 'The analyzed price trends for the specified time period.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GoldFuturesAPI.analyze_price_trends, 它的参数输入如下: 'time_period'是'1 year', 'analysis_type'是'historical'.
